'''Stone Pillar Seal''' is an exploration mechanic in [[Sumeru]].

Neutralizing all of them and defeating the unsealed enemies are required for the [[World Quest]] ''[[Legends of the Stone Lock]]''.

==Overview==
Stone Pillar Seals are found sealing [[Ruin Machines]]. Use {{Pyro}} to neutralize the energy within them to release the machines from the seal, then defeat the unsealed enemy.
